caption: Incredibly clean restaurant, fresh ingredients, and very nice staff. So happy that there is a healthy option in Bay Ridge, it is a nice addition to 86th street.

Not enough food given for the price. Not enough options compared to other salad places around the country. They didn't offer any sides or nothing. Didn't really get a good vibe in the place. Was still hungry after. Won't be back. Not the worst, not the best.

Time For Salad is my absolute favorite restaurant in Bay Ridge!!! Wonderful selection and everything is always incredibly fresh. Every time I’ve went they’ve fresh cut apples or avocados for me. Owner and his employees are so incredibly sweet and always make sure your order is just how you’d like it. Perfect place if you’re craving a salad or soup! The “create your own” section is my favorite :)

A family member placed 5 orders... they didn’t have the Greek Salad that was on the internet menu, therefore, ordered what was available, and brought them home. The chicken was very dry, and the dressing wasn't very good. Only reason one person ate her entree was because she was famished. On a positive note, the lettuce was crisp and clean.  I tried calling them before posting this review and it rang a full 3 minutes with no answer. I’m mostly disappointed because generally a new place that opens in a very competitive location should be exceptional, that’s why I recommend it in the first place.

I enjoyed my food here. They have a minimalist design and their food is minimalism as well. For example, they don't put salt or pepper in their soups, you have to do it yourself. I got a soup and a warm bowl and enjoyed both. Next time I will build my own salad which had a base price of 8.59 but with the chicken and a couple extra toppings, in will probably come out to around 13-15 with tax. Not s bad place. It's new and the ingredients are high quality. The staff is also very friendly. I wish them good luck in being a newly opened business. Come check them out and give them some patronage.

I came in on my lunch break for the first time and got a wonderful salad - way bigger portion than I could eat in one sitting! Great service by a friendly young lady who guided me through the menu process. Thanks Alissa - I'll definitely be back!

It is a good place  I enjoy my  soup and sandwiche food there  so good and the girls ther amazing special  girl with red lipstick and a perfect nail  she so friendly  and help me to pick a perfect  drink and good meal  I am almost go there  every day  👌👌❤
My new store love it

I love going to salad based establishments such as this but I think it's a smidge overpriced for what I received. I chose the create your own salad option and the toppings were super small in comparison to the lettuce. I left feeling not quite satisfied and a smidge hungry still.  On a positive note the staff was super nice!  Will def revisit maybe in a month or two after they've settled in more.
Very good food. The woman behind the counter was very nice and helpful

The sweetest staff & a lovely location - however, the food isn’t worth the price (got to try a few different bowl variants thanks to everyone in the family ordering something different).  DETAILS:  The staff was helpful, sweet, and attentive - the best any establishment could have. Their service alone is deserving of 5 stars.  The environment was light & airy, but definitely needs some soft music to make the space feel less empty.  The food wasn’t bad, but it wasn’t great (places like Sweetgreen are definitely better). With an abundance of choices, you can create a bowl to your liking. However, the portions for the protein options aren’t worth the extra charge.  RESPONSE:  Thank you for your reply! I think there was some confusion regarding my comment on the portions. I was noting how the bowls are mostly comprised of greens due to how small the topping portions are (which isn’t exaggerated by the larger bowl since there are no other toppings past what is visible in the photo).  I made the comparison to another establishment that charges slightly more ($11.59 at Time 4 Salad, $12.25-$13.95 at the other place) and provides larger topping portions to note how I’d be happier to pay more to get more (not additional toppings, but larger portions of the toppings that are already included).

I’m the General Contractor of this salad restaurant, as well as a salad lover and I must say Time4Salad will be taking over the NY salad scene very soon. The food is freshly made, the staff is warm and kind and it’s the best salad place in the area. So don’t hesitate to come stop by for a salad sometime you won’t regret it!
I truly enjoyed this restaurant. Great food and service. You can feel the high quality of products when you get to the counter and the ambience is very relaxing. I will be back for more soon!

Finally! A healthy salad destination that uses simple, fresh ingredients has opened in Bay Ridge!! You can order signature salads and warm bowls or build your own. They also offer cold-pressed juice from Raw Juicery. I highly recommend if you want to eat healthy.

I genuinely recommend that you pay this place a visit. Their salads and dressings are quite unique and outstanding. Something that could not go unnoticed is the customer-friendly crew. One could instantly acknowledge the earnestness of each and every employee in this place. The overall vibe of the restaurant is positive and relaxing; let alone the spotlessness of the tables, counters, walls, and bathroom. What a great experience.  The environment of the restaurant is something I’ll never forget; and that’s also what keeps me going there more often. You’ll feel like you’re in a whole different place with a whole new people. The design is conspicuously a new kind of modern, yet so familiar and cozy. The spirit of the staff and the place will make you feel like home.  Some may argue that the place is a bit expensive; trust me, you’ll get exactly what you paid for. The plates that they use for serving are huge. Which means that you’ll be getting lots of greens that can ultimately keep you full for an entire day.  I personally believe that their salads, unlike other places, are immensely nutritious. They use vegetables, fruits, cheese, meat, myriad seeds, and unbelievably tasty and unique dressing.  Definitely will be going there more often.
My 1st time.  Certainly not my last. Simply outstanding salad.
Today I passed and I liked a lot, I recommend it for people who want to eat healthy outside the home, very attentive and polite staff !!

Staff is great! So friendly. 86th street was in a need of a healthy alternative to all of the fast food restaurants. It’s been our 3rd visit here already. Love supporting my small business in the neighborhood. Everything is fresh and delicious. We don’t mind spending $10-12 on a healthy meal.  They also have juices and so many of them include ginger which we love!

Excellent new place!!! Healthy salads and very unique fresh juices. The prices are great too. Beautiful and clean restaurant. Thank goodness they opened! I bought a cleanse for the week and I’ll be back 😊😊

My first time trying this place out and I have to say...FINALLY a place in the neighborhood for a delicious hearty salad/healthy meal!!! I’ve been so disappointed in the salad options around here for so long that Time for Salad has been a God-sent! Fresh, tasty greens, plenty of topping options, friendly and accommodating staff-I can’t wait to go back and try their warm bowls and pressed juices!  My only other feedback is I would recommend investing in some bowls for tossing-it would elevate the place to another level of greatness to have the option for customers to have their salads already tossed.  I will definitely be returning (regularly at that)!

The salads are very hearty and tasty there are vegetarian and vegan options... the staff and owners are super nice there are many options of vegetables hot and cold. They serve warm bowls. My favorite things on the menu are the kale and quinoa.Go there take your mom, your kids and your loved ones.. Also I forgot to mention they have a great selection of pressed juices super fresh.

I went here right after getting off the bus with my friends from college. After a long week of exams, this place brightned up my whole week. The atmosphere was amazing, the food was amazing, and its the best option to eat on the whole block and worth the price!!
Everyone in there is so sweet and nice. The food is amazing. Every ingredient to the salads taste fresh and delicious. I definitely am going again. The portions are so big and everything was great
I want to apply to work there what can i do

Had a warm bowl here and found it so delicious that I came right back to try another one the following night. Super friendly and attentive staff, and the salad tastes great. My appetite is such that I usually can't make a full meal out of a salad, but these are an exception. Nice to have a place close to my gym where I can grab some dinner afterwards that won't undo the work I just did. This place is just what the area needs and a welcome addition. Will go again for sure.
Wonderful place and they have make your own salads of your choosing for a healthy lifestyle. Staff is very friendly. I will definitely come back again.
